rows.label: tev027201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev027201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Milly about her mission.

rows.label: tev027201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev027201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Milly if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev027201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Milly about her mission.

rows.label: tev027201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Milly about recent developments.

rows.label: tev027201_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Milly about life in the caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0001
rows.name:
After NLA signed that friendship treaty or whatever
with the Nopon, Vandham assigned me to this caravan
indefinitely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0002
rows.name:
At first I was pissed. It's dry as a dead dilus's butt
out here, and I kept getting sand in my mouth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0003
rows.name:
But I like the caravan leader, Mujiji. He's got a mouth
on him, but deep down he's a nice guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0004
rows.name:
The Nopon give me lots of great food to eat,
and they bundle up close when it gets cold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0005
rows.name:
And I guess more than anything, they're really cuteâ€”
so it's hard to stay mad at anything for long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Never turn your back on the weather here in Oblivia,
I tell you what.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0014
rows.name:
When the heat waves come, you feel like your skin's
peeling off, but you're too hot to do anything about it.
Bad time for close-quarters combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0015
rows.name:
And when the sandstorms come? Hoo-ee! You can't see
a foot in front of you, and none of your attacks seem
to find their mark.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0020
rows.name:
I hear the BLADE pros use the heat waves to their
advantage and fight with heat-based attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0021
rows.name:
But I don't know about that. The last thing I want to do
when I'm hot is add more heat to the equation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0009
rows.name:
I wonder when they'll call me back from this mission
with the caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0010
rows.name:
I mean, the BLADEs back in the city are having a tough
time fighting off the Ganglion, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0011
rows.name: Don't they want me to go back and help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0012
rows.name:
It's a shame I have to stay out here, nestled in the
warm, soft, spherical embrace of the Nopon,
doing nothing but clerical work...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0013
rows.name:
But those are my orders! So I guess I must leave
the city in your capable hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0016
rows.name: I'm glad Henahena is feeling better now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0017
rows.name:
When she was sick, it took her a whole week to eat
just one cosse bean. Now she can down a whole
bucket in three seconds flat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Of course, that means she's also filling out even
more...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, as long as she's healthy, I guess I don't care.
Oh, and we also found her boyfriend,
so that's another piece of good news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG1001
rows.name: Hey, nice work on the mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG1002
rows.name:
The moment HQ sent word of the Ganglion's defeat,
Mujiji gave me a big pat on the back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG1003
rows.name:
Then he threw a little party to celebrate.
Can you believe it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG1004
rows.name:
I wish I could have gone to the city to help out with
the fight, but my place was here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027201_MSG1005
rows.name:
Mujiji's got a mouth on him, but he's a good leader.
I wouldn't want to let him down.[ST:wait ]
